duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet guests, provide menus, communicate restaurant specials, take food and beverage orders, and attend to guests' needs.
Enter orders into the point-of-sale system accurately and serve items ordered.
Serve alcoholic beverages responsibly and prepare and deliver the check to guests at the table.
Collaborate with other restaurant servers and perform opening, closing, cleaning, and side work duties.
Ensure all equipment and workspaces are clean, sanitized, organized, and working properly.
